dc:title: Tribute to Mr. O'Connell
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appreciation of the carpentry labors of Mr. O'Connell at the Easton farm, his storytelling, and love of children and animals.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 362 1940-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
